daily_activities: Visit the famous Ram Janmabhoomi temple 🕉️, a revered Hindu site, by walking 🚶 from your hotel.
Explore the Ayodhya Fort 🏯, a historic fortress with stunning views of the Saryu River 🌊, using a cab 🚖 for transportation.
Take a stroll along the Ghats of Saryu River 🌊, enjoying the serene atmosphere and local street food 🍴, accessible by bus 🚌.
Discover the Kanak Bhavan temple 🕊️, known for its beautiful architecture and peaceful ambiance, by taking a short walk 🚶.
Visit the Hanuman Garhi temple 🐒, a significant shrine dedicated to Lord Hanuman, using a cab 🚖 for convenience.
Explore the Ayodhya Museum 🏛️, showcasing the city's rich history and cultural heritage, accessible by train 🚆 from the city center.
Attend the morning Aarti at the Nageshwarnath temple 🕉️, a sacred site with a unique Shivling, by walking 🚶 from your hotel.
Take a boat ride ⛵ on the Saryu River, offering breathtaking views of the city and its ghats, with a guide providing insights into the local ecosystem.
Visit the Gulab Bari 🌺, a beautiful garden with a rich history, using a cab 🚖 for transportation.
Visit the Mani Parvat temple 🏔️, situated on a hilltop with stunning views of the city, accessible by bus 🚌 and a short hike 🚶.
Explore the Chakratirth temple 🕉️, a significant site with a unique circular structure, using a cab 🚖 for convenience.
Enjoy the local cuisine and shopping 🛍️ at the Ayodhya Bazaar, accessible by walking 🚶 from your hotel.
Discover the Treta Ke Thakur temple 🕊️, a sacred site with a rich history and cultural significance, by taking a short walk 🚶.
Visit the Ram ki Paidi 🌊, a beautiful ghat with stunning views of the Saryu River, using a cab 🚖 for transportation.
Attend the evening Aarti at the Dasrath Bhavan temple 🕉️, a revered site with a unique ambiance, accessible by bus 🚌.
Take a day trip to the nearby Faizabad city 🏙️, known for its rich history and cultural heritage, using a train 🚆 for transportation.
Visit the Faizabad Fort 🏯, a historic fortress with stunning views of the surrounding landscape, accessible by cab 🚖.
Explore the Guptar Ghat 🌊, a sacred site with a unique ambiance, by taking a short walk 🚶 from the fort.
Visit the Bharat Kund 🌊, a sacred site with a rich history and cultural significance, by taking a short walk 🚶 from your hotel.
Explore the Shri Rama Janaki Birla temple 🕉️, a beautiful shrine with stunning architecture, using a cab 🚖 for convenience.
Enjoy the local street food 🍴 and shopping 🛍️ at the Ayodhya Market, accessible by walking 🚶 from your hotel.
Attend the morning Aarti at the Ram Janmabhoomi temple 🕉️, a revered Hindu site, by walking 🚶 from your hotel.
Take a farewell stroll along the Ghats of Saryu River 🌊, enjoying the serene atmosphere and local scenery, accessible by bus 🚌.
Depart from Ayodhya 🚖, taking back memories of the city's rich history, cultural heritage, and spiritual significance.

travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a train to Ayodhya Cantonment railway station (AY) or Faizabad Junction (FD) which is the nearest railway station to Ayodhya. You can take trains like the Ahmedabad - Darbhanga Sabarmati Express or the Ahmedabad - Varanasi Sabarmati Express. From the railway station, hire a taxi or take a bus to reach Ayodhya.
